reviewText: This is a well done torture porn movie. It was disturbing but very watchable after the slow start. The villain was brutal and the women were attractive. What more could you ask for from this specific genre?

If you've never seen a movie before, this may be entertaining for you. If you have the script is so derivative, predictable and perfunctory that you can predict how this movie will end after watching a brief beginning.
 That might not be completely unwatchable if the acting or directing was good. It is not.
Don't waste your time.
